name: mood
command:
action.raw(( // legacy command wrapper
   function mood(a){var responses = [
    'happy (◍•ᴗ•◍)',
    'sleepy (-_-)zzz',
    'horny ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)',
    'dog (❍ᴥ❍ʋ)',
    'surprised (⚆_⚆)',
    'annoyed (¬_¬)',
    'upset .·´¯`(>▂<)´¯`·.',
    'smoochy ( ˘ ³˘)♥',
    'retarded ヘ（。□°）ヘ',
    'unsure ⊜_⊜',
    'serious (•_•)',
    'content (◡‿◡✿)',
    'frisky （*＾3＾）/～♡',
    'baked ( ͡ຈ ͜ʖ ͡ຈ)',
    'sad ʘ︵ʘ',
    'mad 凸(⊙▂⊙✖ )',
    'classy (•_•) ( •_•)>⌐■-■ (⌐■_■)',
    'drunk （ ^_^）o自自o（^_^ ）',
    'alarmed (┛◉Д◉)┛彡┻━┻',
    'wat ●_●',
    'dancy └(=^‥^=)┐',
    'suave 〜(￣△￣〜)',
    'sassy (~˘▾˘)~'
    ];
return responses[(0| (new Date) / 1e5) % responses.length]}
)(input, input.split(' '), IRC.message));
